column1: * 1952 - The Inklings have dinner at C.S. Lewiss house
column2: in the company of Dr. Firor of John Hopkins University. The evening was described by J.R.R. Tolkien as "like a glimpse of old times: quiet and rational (since Hugo Dyson was not asked)."

column1: * 1968 - The third day of filming J.R.R. Tolkien for the documentary Tolkien in Oxford.

column3: and the Call to Christian Community" conference
